mean_cn: n. 分布；分配；分发；散布
mean_en: the way that something is shared or exists over a particular area or among a particular group of people
word_etyma: distribut分配 + ion名词后缀 → distribution 分配
sentence: This chart shows the distribution of nuclear weapons around the world.
sentence_trans: 这张图表显示出世界各地核武器的分布。
